creator: james.harman@requisite.com
text:
The toEncode() method in HttpServletResponseFacade is appending ;jsessionid= + 
sessionid onto the url.  This is causing problems for us when trying to use the 
url returned to hit the servlet again.  But, if the url is changed to have ?
jsessionid  it seems to work.  

Should this method append ?jsessionid instead of ;jsessionid ?

creator: nacho@apache.org
text: This is not a bug, per the servlet spec ..
